columns.SongId: The unique identifier for each song performance.
columns.Bandmate: The unique identifier for each band member involved.
columns.StagePosition: The position of the bandmate on stage during the performance.

Performance.table_description: The table tracks performance details for each song by bandmates.

columns.AlbumId: The unique identifier for each album containing the tracks.
columns.Position: The order number of the song within the album tracklist.
columns.SongId: The unique identifier for each song in the database.

Tracklists.table_description: The table organizes songs into their respective album tracklists.

columns.SongId: The unique identifier for each song featuring vocals.
columns.Bandmate: The unique identifier for each band member providing vocals.
columns.Type: The vocal type performed by the bandmate in the song.

Vocals.table_description: The table records vocal contributions of bandmates for each song.

columns.SongId: The unique identifier for each song in the database.
columns.Title: The title or name of the song.

Songs.table_description: The table stores information about songs and their titles.

columns.AId: The unique identifier for each album in the music database.
columns.Title: The name of the album as released.
columns.Year: The year when the album was released.
columns.Label: The record label that published the album.
columns.Type: The genre or style classification of the album.

Albums.table_description: The table catalogs albums with their titles, release years, labels, and types.

columns.Id: The unique identifier for each band in the database.
columns.Firstname: The first name of the band member.
columns.Lastname: The last name of the band member.

Band.table_description: The table organizes band members with their identifying names.

columns.SongId: The unique identifier for each song that features instruments.
columns.BandmateId: The unique identifier for each band member playing an instrument.
columns.Instrument: The name of the instrument played by the bandmate in the song.

Instruments.table_description: The table details instruments played by bandmates for each song.
